mapper.insert: insert into shows (showId, cinemaId, hallCode, filmId, filmName, language, showStartTime, showVersionType, showScreenType, settlePriceForMerchant, settlePriceForCinema, fee, price, minPrice, canSell, movieStandId, hallName, createTime, updateTime) values (#{showid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cinemaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hallcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showstarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showversiontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showscreentype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlepriceformerchant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settlepriceforcinema,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cansell,jdbcType=BIT}, #{moviestandid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hallname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update shows set cinemaId = #{cinemaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hallCode = #{hallcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filmId = #{filmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, filmName = #{filmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, showStartTime = #{showstarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, showVersionType = #{showversiontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, showScreenType = #{showscreentype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settlePriceForMerchant = #{settlepriceformerchant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, settlePriceForCinema = #{settlepriceforcinema,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, minPrice = #{minprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, canSell = #{cansell,jdbcType=BIT}, movieStandId = #{moviestandid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hallName = #{hallname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where showId = #{showid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select showId, cinemaId, hallCode, filmId, filmName, language, showStartTime, showVersionType, showScreenType, settlePriceForMerchant, settlePriceForCinema, fee, price, minPrice, canSell, movieStandId, hallName, createTime, updateTime from shows where showId = #{showid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
